Class SearchHit

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.SearchHit

  • public class SearchHit
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple container for representing a single web search result.
    Author:
    Miles Efron

      • addTextToVector

        public void addTextToVector(java.lang.String text)
        Adds zero or more words to this SearchHit's FeatureVector.
        Parameters:
        text - zero or more words to be added to this object's feature vector.

      • getTextVector

        public FeatureVector getTextVector()
        Provides access to a vector representation of all the text associated with this search hit.
        Returns:
        An object of type FeatureVector, containing the URL, snippet and title text from this hit.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Returns the query-document similarity score for this Search Hit. If we're not re-scoring our documents, search hits obtained from the Bing API have no value for this field. Unless you specifically set a search hit's score, its score value==0;
        Returns:
        A query-document similarity score.
